name: Christmas Presents
description: Use this poll to vote on what you want for Christmas

candidates.name: Mario Kart 8
candidates.description: Family cartoony kart racer with plenty of RNG.

candidates.name: Wonderland Wars
candidates.description: Fantasy push-your-luck bag-building area control game.

candidates.name: FrostHaven
candidates.description: Sequel to Gloomhaven, a co-op dungeon crawler set in a huge fantasy campaign.

candidates.name: Ankh
candidates.description: Third in the Lang series - strategic area control in an Egyptian setting.

candidates.name: Ticket to Ride
candidates.description: Draw cards and build connecting train rules.  Great gateway game since it's easy to learn.

candidates.name: Tainted Grail
candidates.description: Co-op story-driven exploration and card-based combat set in a corrupted Arthurian universe.

candidates.name: Alchemist
candidates.description: Compete to deduce the ingredients in a mysterious potion.
